text: Glenn Robert Tasker (10 November 1951 – 15 August 2019) was an Australian sport administrator. He was known for his works in swimming, tennis and the Paralympic movement. He was President of the Australian Paralympic Committee from 2013 to 2018. Tasker died while in a coma on 15 August 2019 in Sydney due to cardiac arrest-related problems, aged 67.Swimming Mourns the Loss of Glenn Tasker – The People’s Leader ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Australian sport administrators
title: Glenn Tasker
